jcr:root.jcr:description: Hey all, its getting colder outside, and I just wanted to send out a friendly reminder for all of you all-day hikers to pack warm. I went out for a nice hike above 6,000’ yesterday and didn’t think to bring some gloves. I still have all my fingers, but it wasn’t as fun a hike as I was looking forward to.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Don’t forget your gloves!
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

j3wl-if_you_wantglovess.jcr:description: If you want gloves specifically for hiking, make sure that the outer shell fabric stretches. Otherwise, you are bound to tear them at the seams a lot sooner than you would like.
j3wl-if_you_wantglovess.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

ppfm-and_a_hat_ijustor.jcr:description: And a hat! I just ordered the Montreal cap...can’t wait to get it.
ppfm-and_a_hat_ijustor.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
